Description: Sherd of pottery kiln-support; dark red Nile silt clay; asymmetrical bowl-shaped with flat 'foot'; incised inscription on 'underside'.
Curator's comments: Comparable pieces, notably 1910,0222.243, have a hole to the centre, which is not preserved in this case.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (TG.1)
